name: Soul Siphon
content: This thin black wand emits crackling green necrotic energy capable of draining the very souls from your foes.
content-md: This thin black wand emits crackling green necrotic energy capable of draining the very souls from your foes.

data.Description: This thin black wand emits crackling green necrotic energy capable of draining the very souls from your foes.
